data.name: Darwin's Aquarium
data.detailed_description:
The game is a realtime fish simulation with realtime learning artificial intelligence.
Build up a tank, start training and breeding your own fish and maybe some day, start defeating the big evil bossfish!
Earn money by advancing your breeding capabilities, improve your breeding grounds and unlock more valuable fish.

You'll see plenty of unbelievable fish interaction: Fish that start hunting, fleeing, cooperating. Some might learn to farm algae, other might start to bait less harmful fish... who knows..? There is no limit to the interaction of the fish and every evolution of species can bring new features. Make sure you select your fish carefully and only breed the fittest, so you can compete against the other fish.
It's up to you and your fish to cooperate with other players or just defeat them- but be warned: Your fish are getting intelligent. They might have their own will soon!

Note: The game is under active development and therefore the ingame graphics might look a little bit diffrent then the screenshots.
Plans: There is currently a building system, a complex mutation system, a complete AI backend to train fish and much more. That all aims toward build a best-possible simulation of real life evolution of fish plus alot of fun by doing so. Multiplayer(PVP and PVE), ghlobal trading (player to player), and cooperative training on the same fish should all be finished on release. The game probably will fit all the needs for simulating game theory examples, as well as all the stats (Bosses fought, training rewards gained, anchestors tree, rarity, kills...).

UPDATE:
Hey guys - sorry for the delay but we just missed our release date. We are doing good progress and we try to get it released within the next month! We apologize!

data.short_description: Breeding and training intelligent fish is your hobby. Discover new species and defeat the bossfish - make your fish become real animals - with real brains... brwwww. Learn AI the easy way - like playing.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel x86 i5
  • Graphics: Nvidea GTX 960
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Desktop 19.0+
  • Processor: Intel x86 i5
  • Graphics: Nvidea GTX 960
